google_reviews.author: pamela macdonald
google_reviews.review: Thanks to the folks at NW Living for helping us become accustomed to the different areas that Bellingham, along with Ferndale, Birch Bay and Blaine have to offer.  We found our perfect home for the 2 of us in Bellingham.  I will say the whole process was made easier with their professionalism and expert knowledge of the real estate market.

google_reviews.author: Jean Gischer
google_reviews.review: My experience with NW Living was amazing. Mimi Osterdahl helped me educate myself about the process and finances after I had been living in one home for 50 years. She and John staged my home extremely well and I had lots of support as I packed up and moved. We found a beautiful home quickly and it was an excellent experience. Mimi was a joy to work with!

google_reviews.author: Casey Burton
google_reviews.review: Highly recommend NW Living Group! Mimi and her team (shout-out to John & Leela) been such a huge asset to us when buying and selling homes along with purchasing commercial property. Drawing from their experience and knowledge has been incredibly helpful in all transactions. We've been beyond impressed with their ability to communicate and keep us (and all parties) on tight deadlines even in complex situations. Kudos to them - for real! We'll continue to recommend them to friends, family, and strangers. Thanks NW Living folks!

owner_response.text:
Thank you , Casey!!
You know what really makes us happy?  
Its when we get to help awesome people like you and Britt achieve their goals and dreams!!! 
Even better than that is making such great friends along the way!
Yay!  
-Mimi and John

google_reviews.author: Brad Kerstiens
google_reviews.review: Sally helped us buy and sell our home. She was extremely kind, helpful,  and going above and beyond to help us find the perfect home. She helped line up a contractor to meet us at a showing and even played with our toddler was we viewed another home. She found us the perfect home in the neighborhood we wanted. Sally has a wonderful crew and got our house ready for the market. She got our first bid on our house in three days. She helped us along each step of the way. I highly recommend her and would use her again in the future.

google_reviews.author: Richard Chrappa
google_reviews.review: Sally walked us through a very difficult and complicated transaction, simultaneously selling and buying homes. She stood by us when the going got tough and we were still pushing forward. She was always enthusiastic, pleasant, encouraging and accommodating to our evolving needs. We feel that we got the best possible outcome and will always be grateful to Sally for getting us here. If you need a great realtor, Sally and her team are the bomb!

google_reviews.author: Eric Tepner
google_reviews.review: We recently shopped for and closed on a house in Bellingham from 6000 miles away! Sally Farrell was not only our eyes, ears and nose, she was always one step ahead and guided us through the entire process with little to no stress. I loved how she wasn't afraid to tell us the negatives of a property before trying to sell us on it. Talk about integrity! She provided us with 360 videos of the properties we were interested in and even videoed the streets and neighborhoods. Sally's experience shows and we would highly recommend her for anyone looking for a trust worthy advocate and great negotiator.

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Gary
google_reviews.review: Mimi recently helped us sell my mother's condominium in Bellingham.  We had an excellent offer within a few days of putting it on the market.  Mimi was a pleasure to work with.  She not only knows the business, but goes above and beyond for clients.  When the weather suddenly turned cold, she went over to the condo to turn the heat on and to take care of other details to weather proof the unit. She took care of many other small details that would have been a headache for us to deal with as out of towners.  She was always prompt and positive with responses to questions and every interaction with her was pleasant and positive.  She enjoys her job and it shows by the care she gives her clients.

google_reviews.author: Anne Kincaid
google_reviews.review: I recently sold a condo in Bellingham under difficult personal circumstances.  Sally Farrell and her team went above and beyond the call of duty in so many ways that far exceeded my hopes and expectations.  Sally was extremely knowledgeable and helpful in assisting me to prepare for the sale.  I highly recommend Sally to anyone who needs a professional and responsive realtor!

google_reviews.author: Michael & Kelly Powers
google_reviews.review: Honestly, our family would NOT have been able to find a home without Sally Farrell at Northwest Living (Exp Realty). Not only is she a wonderful human being, she is a highly skilled professional with great intuition. Sally helped us discern what we wanted/needed, and guided us in finding a home in our price range that would suit the needs of our family...in Bellingham of all places where the market is SO crazy.  Once we found a home, Sally worked tirelessly to make sure EVERYTHING was on track and arranged for a myriad of inspections, estimates and repairs to be done before we closed. I have no idea how she was able to do it all except for the fact she might actually be  Wonder Woman incognito. If you are looking to buy a home, you will be beyond pleased and impressed working with Sally Farrell (and her entire team...esp awesome Diana Burgeon who helped us immensely while Sally was out of town).

google_reviews.author: Helen Fogel Egan
google_reviews.review:
Sally Farrell of NWLiving was our realtor in our recent home purchase in Bellingham, Wa.  Highly intuitive, Sally quickly figured out our housing priorities and found us the perfect new home for our relocation from Sedona, Arizona.  Friendly, energetic, professional, and knowledgeable, Sally helped navigate us through all the stages of todays tough, competitive real estate market.  We highly recommend Sally to help with your real estate needs.  She is a great pleasure to work with.
Helen and Gene Egan

google_reviews.author: Heidi Higginbottom
google_reviews.review: Mimi is nothing short of an angel. When my family and I had the crazy idea of purchasing our future home while still living full time in Europe, Mimi was very up to the challenge. During the short time we did have in Bellingham, we felt Mimi and her team were willing to go above and beyond to set up showings and flex with our wild ideas and crammed schedule. She humbly helped us to understand the contracts and jargon of the industry, despite her decades of expertise. Even when we stumbled upon unsavory challenges, we felt Mimi was our biggest supporter and advocate to the extent of her ability (and then a bit further). We will forever be grateful for the serendipity that brought her and her team into our home buying experience and lives.

owner_response.text: It is working with people like Heidi, Derek and their family to help them achieve their goals that makes my work meaningful.  I could not be more blessed than to have the great joy of working with such lovely clients.

google_reviews.author: Erin Douglas
google_reviews.review: I cant say enough about the wonderful services we received during the sale of our house! We had numerous offers after just one day of the listing. Our realtor, Sally Farrell, led us through the painless process via email, text, and phone. The sale was complete in just 28 days. I highly recommend EXP!

google_reviews.author: JaneLee Waldock
google_reviews.review: Mimi's team was so knowledgeable, responsive, and supportive! Having worked with Mimi in the past, when I unexpectedly found the home for me, I wrote Mimi first thing in the morning and by that afternoon we had a game plan in place. I would definitely recommend working with EXP Realty and Mimi!

google_reviews.author: Mary Chaney
google_reviews.review: Mimi Osterdahl-Eggers is an excellent Realtor! We have used her considerable knowledge and expertise in 6 transaction in the last 2 years.  And she is delightful to work with!

owner_response.text: Thank you Mary and Michael for the awesome review!  Working with lovely people like you to help you achieve your goals makes me so thankful and grateful to be a Realtor!

google_reviews.author: Kris Moulaison
google_reviews.review: Mimi is the BEST!! So great to work with...I highly recommend her to everyone. She is a knowledgeable, friendly, and conscientious professional who works really hard to delivery for all her clients!

google_reviews.author: Julie Bowman
google_reviews.review: Mimi is a true professional. She puts her clients interest as her top priority.  She is reliable a great communicator and an overall great agent

google_reviews.author: Phil Arnone
google_reviews.review: Sally Farrell helped my wife and I find our first home.  She really went above and beyond what I expected from a realtor.  Thanks Sally!!

owner_response.text: Sally is the best!  NW Living is lucky to have her in our team!

google_reviews.author: Julie Nicoll
google_reviews.review: Sally was a great realtor. She was invaluable to our search and always had a smile.

google_reviews.author: Sylvia Albers
google_reviews.review: Love this Lady !  She is so full of energy and life cant help but get excited about a home with her!  You have to check out a home with her and you will love her too!

google_reviews.author: Test Pattern (seeit360)
google_reviews.review: I think NW Living is really making Real Estate accessible and approachable  for new agents and moving properties for clients. Kudos!

owner_response.text: Thanks for the kind words Greg!  We work hard to make sure our clients and our agents are taken care of and happy! -Mimi

google_reviews.author: Carrie Butler
google_reviews.review: The most wonderful people, with the most wonderful ethos! They truly are "ready professionals helping good people".

owner_response.text: Thank you Carrie!  We love helping nice people buy and sell real estate in this beautiful corner of the world we all get to call "home". -Mimi

google_reviews.author: Tami Elias
google_reviews.review: I am meeting agents in this grp here and there.  Seems like a great company.   Looking forward to deeper connections.

owner_response.text:
Thank you, Tami!  We appreciate the review and look forward to the same! 
If anyone you care about needs a Realtor, please share our name with them. -John and Mimi, NW Living

google_reviews.author: Scott Wrobel
google_reviews.review: They did a great job.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review Scott!  We are so grateful and thankful for it and for YOU!

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Alexandria
google_reviews.review: Great Service!

owner_response.text: Thank you Jennifer!  We strive to help all of our clients with top-notch service to help them achieve their real estate goals and dreams.
Thank you Rideshare Bham for the awesome review!  We really appreciate it and we really appreciate YOU!
Thank you for the awesome review Megan!  We are so grateful for it and YOU!
Thank you for the awesome review Hui-Ling!  We are so very grateful for it and for YOU!
Thank you for the 5-Star review, Lulu!  All of our NW Living - eXp broker's seek to give 5-Star service to every single client we are blessed to serve!  -Mimi

summary.text:
Good

NW LIVING Group | eXp Realty has showcased a consistent level of professionalism and expertise, especially appreciated by clients who are new to the market. The team has been commended for making the process of buying and selling homes straightforward and manageable, thanks largely to their deep knowledge of the local real estate market. Several user reviews highlighted that their communication was clear and timely, which greatly eased the stress of relocating or selling a long-occupied property.

An additional positive noted in user reviews is the team's ability to understand and prioritize clients' needs. For instance, clients who have lived in the same home for many years have found the team’s guidance instrumental in navigating real estate transactions. This ability to provide insightful advice and support throughout the buying or selling process has led to numerous clients achieving their real estate goals with less hassle than anticipated.

Great

Reviews for NW LIVING Group | eXp Realty are overwhelmingly positive, with the company's agents frequently described as going above and beyond for their clients. Clients appreciated the excellent support they received during various stages of buying or selling properties, often resulting in smooth, quick sales. One particularly noteworthy example included a client who managed to secure a property, with full support, while residing thousands of miles away, indicating the company’s capability to handle complex circumstances.

Moreover, the individual agents, like Mimi Osterdahl and Sally Farrell, have garnered personal praise for their dedication and client-focused approach. Sally Farrell received commendations for her ability to manage intricate transactions, such as simultaneously selling and buying properties, and for her knack for overcoming challenges with enthusiasm and positivity. These agents have not only facilitated successful transactions but also formed lasting friendships with clients, underscoring their commitment to client satisfaction which resonates in numerous glowing reviews.

Bad

There were no negative reviews that fell under the category of 'Bad' for NW LIVING Group | eXp Realty. All user reviews found were positive and reflected satisfaction with the services provided by the company. This indicates a consistent quality of service where customer expectations are regularly met or exceeded.

Ugly

There were no reports or reviews associated with any experiences that could be classified as 'Ugly.' NW LIVING Group | eXp Realty has managed to maintain a spotless record across all feedback found. This suggests that the company not only performs well consistently but also effectively addresses any potential issues proactively to prevent bad experiences from arising. No significant complaints about communication troubles, unmet promises, or property management issues were found in the reviews.
